page.title: 05FIELDS - BROCKWORTH AREA
page.content: Near Green Street are fields classified as {Sites of Special Scientific Interest}.In the {spring and summer} the following {wildflowers} can be seen- cowslips,ragged robin,bluebells,lady's smock,dandelions,green-winged orchids, buttercups and ox-eyed daisies. {Hedgerows} include hawthorn,elder,black- berry and dog-rose. {Birds} include starlings, blackbirds, robins,yellowhammers,swallows,cuckoos, sparrows,blue-tits,great-tits,crows, chaffinches,greenfinches and thrushes. {Butterflies} include the white,blue and brimstone;also the orange-tip. Other {rare flowers} in the area include bee and fly orchids at Witcombe Estate.
